titles: Newes out of heauen both pleasaunt [and] ioyfull, lately set forth to the great co[n]solacion [and] co[m]forte of all christen me[n]. By Theodore Basille.
author: Becon, Thomas, 1512-1567.
notes: Last line on C1 recto has: commeth--STC.

keywords: Devotional literature, English --  Early works to 1800.
